entries.situation: When magic fails to revive a dead person, the only solution is to venture to the Outer Planes to find the person?s spirit and either release it or convince it to return.
People who enter the woods keep slipping into the Feywild or Shadowfell, returning changed or not returning at all.
A long-dead oracle knows how to avert a terrible prophecy, but the prophecy?s fulfillment has already begun.
A god has stopped answering prayers and won?t respond to any Commune spell.
A devil has tricked an angel into meddling in the Blood War, and the angel seeks mortal aid.
An ancestor of one character must be convinced to bless them before their bloodline?s full power can be unleashed.
A foolhardy knight carried a holy weapon into the Nine Hells; the powers of Mount Celestia want the weapon and the knight?s remains retrieved.
A titan is imprisoned on an Outer Plane; the characters must stop its release or free it to face a greater threat.
To prove their worth, the characters are sent to slay a monster, win a planar patron?s favor, negotiate peace, or retrieve a lost item on another plane.
An item of legend is being auctioned in Sigil, the City of Brass, or another planar metropolis.
